DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find effect low abdominal pressure vs. standard abdominal pressure cardiac respiratory function patient undergo laparoscopic colon surgery Trendelenberg position . It also design evaluate effect degree neuromuscular blockade surgical condition patient undergo laparoscopic colon surgery Trendelenberg position .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Neuromuscular Blockade Level Intra-abdominal Pressure Surgical Conditions Cardiopulmonary Responses During Laparoscopic Colon Surgery With Trendelenburg Position
